Articles.Content: for some reason my games audio decided to stop working when i used my joystick for the first time, then it would just fade the screen when i tried to bind the joystick again after it reset. I then uninstalled every single mod i had, and nothing changed. i dont remember my steam password so i cant uninstall and reinstall. please help me..........
That's a bit of a unique issue. Delete settings.cfg (or just move it somewhere else) and see if the problem goes away.
